reg.desc: ACP Power Gating (Static). 0: Power is ON, 1: In power ON Process, 2: Power is OFF, 3: In power OFF Process
ATHUB Dynamic Power Gating. Firmware Controlled.
ATHUB Clock Gating. Firmware Controlled.
SMNCLK deep sleep sideband map: for setting Mp1ClkSMNCLKDs_allow sideband for SMNCLK, DS_SMNCLK_MAP_EN[0] = 1. DS_SMNCLK_MAP_EN[0] points to SMNCLK since SMNCLK is slice 0
SMNCLK allow deep sleep signal. SMU Firmware Controlled.
SOCCLK deep sleep sideband map: for setting SysHubSocClkDs_allow sideband for SOCCLK, DS_SYSHUB_MAP_EN[1] = 1. DS_SYSHUB_MAP_EN[1] points to SOCCLK since SOCCLK is slice 1
SOCCLK allow deep sleep signal. SMU Firmware Controlled.

SMNCLK. Convert result to decimal, and divide by 10 to get the frequency. The clock frequency might change every time SysExam is run. This field serves to provide guidance and the result should not be compared against the recommended value.

Screen refresh rate lower bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate >= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN in decimal)

Screen refresh rate lower bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate >= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN in decimal)

If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate >= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN in decimal)

Screen refresh rate lower bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. Screen refresh rate upper bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate <= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX in decimal)

Screen refresh rate upper bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate <= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX in decimal)

Screen refresh rate upper bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate <= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX in decimal)

Screen refresh rate upper bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz.
